question: Who has been sworn-in as the new President of Paraguay?
explanation: Mario Abdo Benítez has been sworn in as the new President of Paraguay  after defeating his liberal rival in 2018 April elections. He succeeded Horacio Cartes.   Mr Abdo Benítez is the son of a close aide to ex-military dictator Alfredo Stroessner & has faced criticism for defending the former leader\'s record.
